sense.def:
To worry
pomeni nenehno razmišljati o nekem problemu ali neprijetnosti, ki bi se lahko zgodila.

seg.quote: Don't worry, Andrew, you can do it.
People worry about the safety of nuclear energy.
I worried that when I got back he wouldn't be there.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
worries someone
, nekomu povzroča skrbi.

seg.quote: Terry was worried by the challenge.
It worried him to think that Sylvie was alone.
People are becoming increasingly worried about pollution.
I was worried that she'd say no.

sense.def:
To worry someone about a problem
pomeni nekoga motiti ali vznemirjati tako, da mu povemo za določen problem.

seg.quote: Why worry her when it's all over?

sense.def:
Worries
so občutki zaskrbljenosti ali nezadovoljstva, ki jih povzroči neki problem ali razmišljanje o neprijetnosti, ki bi se lahko zgodila.

seg.quote: My only worry was that my aunt would be upset.
Bad housing is their main source of worry.
